extendedInfo.description: If you are Brad Paisley's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Brad Paisley's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Brad Paisley's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Brad Paisley's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Who Needs Pictures- Part II- Mud on the Tires- Time Well Wasted- A Brad Paisley Christmas- 5th Gear- Play- American Saturday Night- This Is Country Music-------------------------------- List of lyrics
